## Review Checklist

Before merging this PR, please verify:

- [ ] Award information is accurate and complete
- [ ] No duplicate entries exist
- [ ] Deadline dates are correct
- [ ] Application link is valid and accessible
- [ ] Requirements section is complete
- [ ] All required fields are present in the JSON

## Actions

### To Approve
1. Review the award details above
2. Check the JSON changes in the "Files Changed" tab
3. Click "Merge pull request" button
4. Award will appear on the live website within 2 minutes

### To Edit
1. Go to "Files Changed" tab
2. Click on `data/awards.json`
3. Click the "..." menu â†’ "Edit file"
4. Make your changes
5. Commit to this branch
6. Then merge the PR

### To Reject
1. Close this pull request without merging
2. Optionally add a comment explaining the reason
